Miscellaneous Highlights: The match starts at 8:00 PM ET.
Argentina is fourth in the tournament with six goals in four matches.
Canada has conceded three goals in four matches, eighth in the competition.
Argentina scored 38 goals (2.1 per game) and Canada gave up 21 goals (1.5 per game) in international matches the past two years.
Argentina is third in the in goal differential with six goals scored and one allowed.
Canada is ninth in the in goal differential with two goals scored and three conceded.
Others: The match will be played at MetLife Stadium.
The match will be broadcast on Fox Sports 1 and can be streamed on Fubo.
Tickets for the match are available on StubHub.
